attributes.action: Investigate the use of Public land and Money to build a Football Stadium in Stanley Park
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM should investigate the use by Liverpool Council of Public Money and the giving over of a Public Park to build a Football Stadium. Stanley Park in Liverpool was given to the People of Liverpool for recreation and not for the benefit of a private company. Premier League football clubs are private companies which are run for the benefit the shareholders and not the public of Liverpool.
